author: Staff Reporter
text:
To make the Coimbatore Corporation Zoo at VOC Park a more visitor-friendly venue, the Corporation has embarked on improving the amenities there.

Officials said that they were adding a layer of wire mesh to monkeys’ enclosure and that of birds. The existing wire meshes were badly damaged as they were installed several years ago. They were also making the gaps in the mesh smaller to prevent visitors from reaching out to the animals.

Likewise, the net above the birds’ enclosure was also being changed.

As for the visitors, the Corporation was providing an overhead cover at the drinking water booth and footpath with paver blocks. The existing road was too damaged for a comfortable walk.

The Corporation had allotted Rs. 19 lakh for the purpose, they said.

The move comes in the wake of the Corporation Council taking a few decisions to improve the zoo.

It had decided to rehabilitate domestic animals and birds and send back to forest those animals it treated for injuries.

Mayor P. Rajkumar had said that the number of such animals and birds was high and that led to space constraint. The Corporation had also sought sponsorship to take care of the animals and birds. At last count, the zoo had 900 animals/birds.
title: Zoo renovation work under way in Coimbatore
